item.title: Tennessee Tech Science DMZ
item.description: Prof. Shannigrahi and Prof. Rogers has received a $263K grant from National Science Foundation to create a Science DMZ at Tennessee Tech. Created in collaboration with IT services, this project will enhance movement of large datasets to and from the campus. It will also bring IPV6 deployment to the campus. Link
